From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko/Unitron/Sixshot/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor:





Koga Shuko recieved Hell Beast's transmission.  He sent another transmission, 
telling him to have all his able-to fight forces meet him 3 miles from the Ark
.

He activated the intercom of his ship.
~All forces, this, is Koga Shuko,  we are allied with Hell Beast and his 
forces now.  Meet me outside of the base.  We are going to attack the Ark!~ 
he headed outside, meeting Unitron, Hades, Anubis, Serpentor, and Sixshot 
outside.
